comments.html: The worst part is; they removed it in the middle of 12.4 Mainline as part of bug CSCsg16908. So much for not changing features in the middle of a major version.
comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html: ... and the TAC front-line support will still direct you to upgrade the IOS on your router without asking "do you, by any chance, use FTP server on your box" :)
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak
